title: BEMAVERT
description: BEMAVERT (Benthic Macroinvertebrate Tracker) is the latest innovation to make it easier to analyze  pollution levels using the macrobenthos

title: ASA
subtitle: MAGE 9 Competition Submission
description: ASA is a social media application specifically designed for survivors of sexual harassment to share their stories anonymously and report incidents directly to authorities. The app features an anonymous timeline, "speak up" function for reporting, and a chat for sharing experiences with community.

title: DGScope
description: Introducing DGScope, an innovative application facilitating remote auscultation for doctors. With a modified recording device, physicians can diagnose through medical recordings, enabling efficient and accessible healthcare.

title: AquaSmart
subtitle: Top 2 on PLAYBOX Startup Competition 2023
description: AquaSmart is an application designed for shrimp farmers to efficiently monitor and manage the water quality of shrimp ponds. It integrates with IoT to provide real-time monitoring of pond parameters and allows remote control of aquaculture devices.

title: Aseupan
subtitle: Top 100 Global Google Solution Challenge 2023
description: â€œaseupan" means "meals" in Sundanese, a mobile application that uses Flutter and Golang programming language from Google that focused on being a platform for sharing food with gamification in the form of point collection to fulfill SDGs points 2 and 3.

title: Scylla DELOS
description: Scylla is an open-source UI Components Library that is used on Delos Web App. I worked on this project during my internship at DELOS, which at that time was the first phase for making Scylla
